Class SnmpAgent

java.lang.Object
  org.snmp4j.agent.BaseAgent
      org.accada.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.agent.snmp.SnmpAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, MgmtAgent, org.snmp4j.agent.io.MOPersistenceProvider
public class SnmpAgent
extends org.snmp4j.agent.BaseAgent
implements MgmtAgent

The SNMP agent's core used in the reader management implementation.

create

public static SnmpAgent create(java.io.File bootCounterFile,
                               java.io.File configFile,
                               java.lang.String address)
Creates and returns the singleton instance of the SnmpAgent. If there already exists an instance it returns that instance.

Parameters:
bootCounterFile - The boot counter file
configFile - The config file
address - The SNMP agent's address
Returns:
The singleton instance of the SnmpAgent
